### SCENE 25 – Pani-Puri & Pop-Ins  

_Street-side pani-puri stall._

**Heroine:** Ela unna?  
**Hero:** Meeru intha andam ga undi em labham? Mee andanni aaswadinchedi *memu*; meeru maha aythe addam chusinappudu matrame.  
**Heroine:** Matalni tintava nuvvu…  

_Aman walks up._

**Aman:** Hello guys—disturb chesana?  
**Hero:** Nuvventra ikkada?  
**Heroine:** Nene ramannanu; inko company add aythe bagundu anipinchindi. _(eats one)_  
    Meeru chinnapati nundi friends aa?  
**Aman:** Chinnappudu ma intlo kanna veella intlo-ne ekkuva vundevaadini.  
**Hero:** Ippudu intlo kanna road-la medha ekkuva untunnam.  
**Aman:** So, engineering taruvatha enti?  
**Heroine:** *Job* kadhu—higher degree edhaina cheyyali; actual-ga cheyistaru… antha ma neighbours & family prabhavam.  
**Aman:** Neighbours aa? Computer-Science chadivithe *computer* gurinchi mottam teliyali anna mentality vāladhi—*neeku nachchindhi pursue cheyyu*.  
**Hero:** Inka veldam, padhandi.  

_Heroine locks eyes deeply with Hero as they leave._

_Random calls; heroine holds Hero’s hand while crossing the road._
